P

pace() - Method in class model.cargo.Truck
un-slows the truck, returning the speed to the original one
paceAll() - Method in class control.Responder
resumes the normal speed of all trips that are slowed
paceAllTrucks() - Method in class control.Simulator
resumes normal speed for all slowed trucks
paceTruck(int) - Method in class control.Responder
resumes the standard speed of a slowed trip by id
paceTruck(int) - Method in class control.Simulator
resumes movement speed for a particular slowed truck
pause() - Method in class control.Simulator
pause from the front end pauses the simulator when required
pause() - Method in class ui.SimControlTerminal
 
pause(PrintWriter) - Method in class ui.ZenTerminal
calls the pause method in the simulator and writes the output of the simulator to the PrintWriter object
paused - Static variable in class ui.ZenTerminal
 
per(PrintWriter) - Method in class ui.ZenTerminal
calls the per method in the simulator and writes the output of the simulator to the PrintWriter object
pickTrip(int) - Method in class control.PoolBoy
Picks a trip from the database by its position in the trip pool and returns it
play() - Method in class control.Simulator
play function from the front end starts or resumes the simulator when required
play() - Method in class ui.SimControlTerminal
 
play(PrintWriter) - Method in class ui.ZenTerminal
calls the play method in the simulator and writes the output of the simulator to the PrintWriter object if the simulator is not started already it creates a new simulator and changes the status to started

PoolBoy - Class in control
The Poolboy manages all the pools in the simulator.
PoolBoy(boolean) - Constructor for class control.PoolBoy
The constructor initialized the Poolboy class creates a CArgoConnection initializes the connection and fills both the TripPool and Segment pool
populate() - Method in class model.cargo.CargoConnection
This method obtains the trips from the database, these trips contain most of the data pertaining drivers, trucks and similar data.
PortOfEntry - Class in model.cargo
This class represents a port of entry, trips arrival points are ports of entry unless they are returned mid flight While referring to ports of entry what it's meant are bridges, in the case of this particular application, the bridges joining Cd Juarez and El PAso Texas.
PortOfEntry(Coord, String) - Constructor for class model.cargo.PortOfEntry
 
printPoolStatus() - Method in class control.PoolBoy
prints the status of all pools
